text:
it would be great too if the  SVGShape class could manage Java arcs without 
automatically converting them to Curves. It could be done by providing a new 
SVGArc class, and use it in the SVGShape class.
creator: herve.girod@club-internet.fr
deweese@apache.org
text:
This will be fixed in CVS shortly.
It will generate a path element with an elliptical arc and 
lines if needed (for chord, pie).
